inn1.comm: fuller than a good length, some away movement. Charles squeezes it to third man with the outside half

edged and gone. Fletcher goes first ball. Malinga gets him with an impeccable length, forcing Fletcher to prod at it defensively outside the off stump. He gets a thick outside edge which is easily taken by Kusal. The umpire wants to check the front foot but there is only one inconclusive replay. Too much doubt to be given a no-ball and Fletcher has to go. Terrific start, bringing Fletcher forward and the ball moves away to take the outside edge. Nice fullish length there
fullish length once again, very similar to the previous delivery but Blackwood defensively pats that back off the back foot with not much movement of the feet. Dangerous
back of a length outside off, swings away with the angle created by Malinga's slingy action. JB lets this go though
good length, just outside off. Good tight lines these. Blackwood defends off the back foot with minimal feet movement
fuller than a good length swinging away, Blackwood drives to point off the back foot
bounce and pace, good start from Lakmal. Just outside off and the ball flies to third man off the outside half of Charles' attempted push into the off side
good length moving away again. Blackwood leaves comfortably
fuller length now, a tad too wide but Blackwood pushes this into the off side from the crease
charge and goes over the infield. Blackwood advances and looks to heave this over mid-off but a thick outside edge flies to third man
138 ks, good length on off and a thick outside edge goes on the bounce to gully now. Tight lines continue

nice shot. He played that right under his eyes and did not try to over-hit that. Just leant on the back foot punch through covers for two. No feet movement once again however. Will keep the slip cordon interested at all times

outside edge, thick one and flies just wide off second slip. Charles stays in his crease and tries to muscle this over mid-off but the ball swings away, taking the outside edge, just evading the fielder
just timing and it races away for four. Slower, dipping full toss but the ball strays on Charles' pads who flicks that with terrific timing through square leg for four.
shortish and wide now, Charles flirts at that and pushes this wide off point where Dilshan fumbles and allows two extra runs.
no feet movement yet again. Full and swinging away, Charles looks to power this down the ground but plays outside the line and a thick inside edge goes towards square leg
low, dipping, slow full toss outside off, almost a yorker. Blackwood is deceived but keeps it out
what a shot! Counterattack from Blackwood. Slow delivery outside off and JB pounces on the length, smashing it back over Malinga's head. Great execution. Did not bother keeping that down
charges the bowler yet again. Some more drama. Charles skips down and flat-bats a drive to mid-off
nicely played. Full, swinging away delivery from Lakmal, inducing the drive from Charles but he gets a good stride forward and leaves
short on leg, digs that in with fine leg up but Charles pulls all along the ground towards deep square leg for one
drifts down leg now and a wide is called
drifts down leg again and tickled down to fine leg for four. He may have not got bat on that but the ball races to the boundary off the pad
digs it in yet again, but as a result of the advancing batsman. Goes down leg and wide called
back of a length on middle, Blackwood gives himself room but keeps it out with a block
good length, swinging in to Blackwood who nudges to deep square leg for one

and the change works immediately. Blackwood dances down the track and slogs this straight into the air, the ball carries to mid-on who backtracks and takes a  good catch. Just flighted that on a fullish length and as soon as Blackwood saw the amount of air on the delivery, he stepped down but misjudged the length badly. Did not get close to that. Good captaincy but not clever batting.
flatter down leg, skids on to Charles' pads as he attempts to flick
slower on leg, good stroke. Nicely pushed to long-on
tossed up outside off, Bravo squeezes to point
expansive shot again. Tossed up on off and Bravo muscles a drive to mid-on. Overpitched so the shot was there to play at least
nurdled to deep square leg
good bouncer, digs it in short on middle. Bravo has to hustle under that quickly and does so
fuller and moving away from Bravo who mistimes a drive through point. He gets the gap though for runs
full and a bit of away shape. Bravo looks to play an exuberant drive yet again, but a thick outside edge flies wide of slip again for another boundary
fullish and wide again, asking Bravo to drive but he chooses against it and leaves
good length outside off, Bravo pushes at it with no feet movement and the ball sneaks past his outside edge
smashed for six. Good use of the feet, gets to the pitch outside off and easily times the ball over mid-on for six. The ball just about carries over the boundary
short and wide, Charles cuts but straight to point
clever stuff, gets down early and looks to paddle that fine, connects well enough and the ball evades short fine leg for a brace
short just outside off, Charles gives himself room and gets a thick outside edge which flies past short third man.
slower from SS. Good change of pace and the ball spins too. Pushed to point
massive hoick but no connection. Slower outside off and Bravo looks to hit that over the long-on boundary but the ball grips a touch and beats the swipe.
too short and the ball races away. That is better shot selection. Charles keeps his hands down and rolls his wrists over the ball as he pulls to the fine leg boundary. Quality stroke
back of a length outside off, Charles blocks off the back foot
shortish again but this time the ball skids on to Charles who works this fine towards short fine leg with a  flat-batted swipe
good length now, swinging in towards off stump. better lines. Chops this onto his feet does Charles
good length again, just a bit of inward movement. Steered to third man for one
good delivery and well played from Bravo. Fullish length on middle and Bravo nudges this wide of midwicket, towards mid-on for one
flight on middle, skids on with the arm. An inside edge rolls towards square leg and Bravo wants one, he is sent back though just in time
flighted on leg, worked down to short fine leg
that is close. Skids on with the arm and Bravo shuffles across as he is struck on the pads, onfield call is not out. Very close that, strikes him in front of middle and leg but too much doubt
blocked off the front foot
a tad too short on middle, heaved down to deep midwicket with a fierce pull
shortish on middle and leg, skidding onto Charles who backs away and chops back to the bowler
skidder to start, on middle, Bravo is hustled on the back foot o push back to Mendis
a little bit leg side-ish and the ball tickles off Bravo's pads towards fine leg
not a great delivery, the quicker delivery which strays down leg. Charles just gets some bat on that and gets that fine past fine leg for four
quicker delivery outside off, Charles gets a good stride forward to block
googly on off but Charles plays that well, waits for it and waits for it some more before deflecting to third man for one. Malinga gets some boot on that
too quick on leg stump, Bravo works this towards square leg and picks up an easy two
starts off with a gentle offspinner on middle, drilled back to the bowler
leading edge just goes over the bowler. Way too early into the shot and the ball stops in the pitch too. Somehow the ball lobs over the bowler
fuller and quicker on leg, defended
flight outside off, Bravo muscles the drive on the bounce to long-off. Looked to go over cover but was quick through the shot
massive hit! Good use of the feet to get to the pitch of the flighted delivery, Charles runs down and smashes that over long-on.
darted down leg and Charles misses his flick. There is a massive appeal from Kusal but the umpire doesn't think there is bat
the offspinner on middle which doesn't spin, Bravo plays outside the line and a thick inside edge rolls towards square leg
quicker outside off, Charles uses the pace and cleverly paddle-sweeps this to the left of short fine leg. Found the gap and he got four. Much better from JC
fifty for Charles. What a shot that is. Offspinner outside off and Charles gets down early an clobbers this wide of long-on for another huge six. Picking his shots now
quick on middle, this time Charles stays back and pushes this tomidwicket
pushed into the off side for a quick single
slower offspinner on leg, Bravo nurdles this towards deep square leg for one
flighted on off, drilled to long-off
flat on off, defended back to the bowler
flat and short on middle, chopped to cover after backing away
flat on off once again, defended
short and flat on leg, worked away to midwicket
quick on middle and leg, Bravo rocks back and pushes a ball wide of midwicket for one
nicely bowled. A bit of loop but quick on middle, blocked into the leg side
a touch too quick on leg, easily pushed to deep square leg off the back foot
low full toss on middle, calmly driven to long-on
tossed up but the line is a bit leg side-ish, Bravo tickles that fine past short fine leg for two more
darted in on leg, pushed to midwicket
a bit quick on middle and leg, easily clipped to deep midwicket
flat and shortish on middle and off. Flat-batted to long-on off the back foot
tossed up outside off, driven to cover
lots of turn there. Charles backs away and looks to find a gap through the off side but the ball comes in and Charles finds point
excellent shot. A bit of flight and Charles comes down a touch and muscles this over long-on. Makes it look easy. Good stroke
fullish and straight, blocked
flat on middle, chopped back to the bowler
wild slog again. Bravo gets down and looks to hoick but the sweep goes towards fine leg
pushed to midwicket off the front foot
a bit flat outside off, driven to long-off
short and wide, Bravo backs away and looks to find a gap through off side but picks out point

picks the fielder at midwicket! Against the run of play, SL have a wicket. Short on middle but the ball skids on a touch, Bravo looks to pull over that fielder at midwicket but he doesn't get under that enough and the ball sits up for Dilshan to take in front of his face at midwicket. Siriwardana gets the wicket again when Mathews needs one
short on off, Samuels backs away and looks to cut but finds point
flat outside off, driven to the cover boundary. Muscled past cover, terrific timing and placement.
flat on off, patted back to the bowler
a bit short on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
too short and flat on middle, drilled to long-on
slower on leg, easily clipped to square leg for one
slower outside off, stops a touch in the wicket. But Charles improvises well to find the gap through mid-off for one
doesn't pick that and he is lucky. Flighted but doesn't get to the pitch, Charles goes through with his slog but the ball inside-edges onto his pads
slow on middle, a bit of turn, squeezed to point
terrific shot selection and execution. He gets down early and plays a nice sweep past backward square leg for four
flat on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
very slow on middle, ticked fine towards square leg
short and flat outside off, clipped towards midwicket
short outside off, left alone by Charles
short on middle and leg, Charles rolls his wrists on that to keep it down towards fine leg
full on leg, clipped to square leg off the back foot
full outside off, moving away a tad. Pushed to mid-off who makes a good diving stop
very full outside off, patted to mid-off
fullish outside off, drilled to mid-off again
fullish and flat on off, pushed back to the bowler
too much flight, overpitched outside off, Samuels finds cover
a bit wide and short, Samuels finds the gap through third man. Jayasuriya doesn't give up on the chase and just pulls it in. Thick outside edge maybe
full but flat, pushed to long-on off the back foot
flight on middle, good delivery and good pace. Samuels blocks
a bit flat on leg, Samuels finds midwicket with his flick and sends Charles back
short and wide, Charles plays another good cut. Plays that late in front of point and by the time, the sweeper comes around, they get an easy two
quick on middle, pushed to long-on off the back foot. Good batting here
quick on off and middle, just a bit of turn almost beats Samuels bat but he gets some bat on that towards point
slower on leg, worked to midwicket but he oversteps. No, unacceptable for a spinner. Free hit
not a bad delivery from Mendis. Low full toss and very wide outside off, but inside the tramline. Powered to deep cover
slow again on middle and leg, worked away to square leg
quicker and flat outside off, Samuels opens the face of the bat to push the fullish length towards cover
tossed up outside off, Charles gets down early to paddle sweep but the ball bounces a bit too much and the ball strikes him on the arm. There is a muted appeal but that was never going to be given
short and wide, cut out to the deep cover
fullish and wide, Charles throws his hands at that and muscles a drive over cover. Falls short of Chandimal at long-off
drilled to long-off
slowish outside off, Samuels opens the face and finds point
nicely tossed up on off but Samuels drives to long-off to end the over
flat outside off, Samuels works the ball to point
very full on off, pushed back to the bowler
short and wide, poor ball from Mendis and Samuels latches onto the opportunity and crashes a cut past point for four
shorter and wider, cut in front of cover for four more. Not good bowling this. Giving Samuels some freebies
better, quick juts outside off, defended to cover
very full on off, blocked off the front foot
slower on middle, Charles pushes the ball towards midwicket but Siriwardana fields off his own bowling

gone! He has been given. Charles gets down and looks to sweep but the ball sneaks through and his him in front of off, Charles discusses with Samuels but takes too long before deciding to go for the review. The umpire refuses the review and he has to go. Just drifted on with the arm on that occasion and he missed a straight ball. Don't think the review would have been any good
tossed up on middle, whipped to midwicket
tossed up on middle, blocked off the front foot
shortish and wide, Carter chops one down to point
slower and some flight outside off, squirted out to third man for a wicket-maiden. Siriwardana doing his thing
slower and lots of spin, Samuels is early through the shot. And the ball lobs towards square leg off his body
worked off his hips towards square leg
nicely tossed up outside off, Carter wants to sweep but is early through the shot and the ball lobs up off his glove onto his body
slowish on middle, defended
a bit fuller and quicker on middle, Carter looks to sweep again and is early again. The ball rolls towards fine leg off his arm
flight on off, drilled to mid-off
flighted and pushed wider outside off, Carter comes down and drives to cover
quicker outside off again and flat, steered to point
fast on leg, Carter reverse-sweeps behind point for two
slower on leg, clipped to short fine leg
shorter outside off, played with soft hands towards point for one
tossed up on middle, pushed to the bowler
a bit short on off, Carter gets down and sweeps towards fine leg
tossed up outside off, Samuels comes down  and thumps this over the bowler's head. Good fielding by the long-on fielder, keeps it in
gentle loopy offspinner on leg which Samuels works towards midwicket for a quick single
skiddy delivery, slightly shortish outside off and Carter nails a cut to point
good length on middle to start from Malinga, Samuels goes back to block
back of a length on middle and leg, gets Samuels hopping in his crease. Tickled towards midwicket off his hips
almost chopped on. Fullish length moving away, Carter looks to dab to third man but the ball doesn't swing away as much and Carter inside-edges onto his body
excellent slower delivery on middle, doesn't quite deceive Carter but keeps him satisfied with just a block
good length outside off, a bit of extra bounce and Carter is beaten on the outside edge
slower delivery on middle, defended towards point
fullish length outside off and Samuels steers to third man for one

bowled im. Carter chops onto his stumps. Good length outside off and the wet ball skids onto Carter who is cramped for room, he chooses to play the heave anyway and gets a thick inside edge onto his stumps. He isn't very happy with his shot selection.
splice-jarring length to begin from Lakmal, good stuff. Mohammed can only bunt it back down the pitch
excellent stuff from Lakmal. Fuller than a good length just outside off, Mohammed slices the ball to point
good length but slightly leg side-ish, clips this towards midwicket for a quick single
short of a length on middle, Samuels goes back and tries to cut but the ball bounces extra and Samuels is beaten on the attempted cut as he backs away
low dipping full toss, the Malinga-special. Mohammed thinks of ducking and gets inside the line as the ball dips under his waist, Mohammed manages to flick to fine leg
he gets that through for a couple. Full outside off, Samuels gives himself room and drives wide of cover who half-stops it
quick, inswinging yorker attempted but ends up a half-volley as Samuels drills to long-on
slower ball on middle, grips in the wicket. Mohammed is hit on the body as he tries to nudge into the leg side
full outside off, powered straight to mid-off with a drive
another excellent over from Malinga, slower ball on middle and Mohammed can only push this back to the bowler
smashed, what power! Full outside off, Samuels clears his front foot, opens up the off side and powerfully muscles the drive through cover. What timing. No chance for any fielder
shortish outside off, on a good length. Samuels clears that foot again but misses his cut
races off the bat, what timing on offer. fantastic to watch. Short outside off, Samuels backs away and crunches a cut through point
overpitched on middle, attempted yorker but Samuels digs it out and drives it hard into the pitch over Lakmal towards mid-off for a quick run
fuller than a good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
cut away nicely past point. A bit too short again from Malinga and Mohammed can get behind the line to execute the cut
full on middle, Samuels clears that foot again and creams a drive through cover but Mathews has been right on point so far in this innings, he has a deep cover and the ball goes straight to him

sitter is taken. Mohammed's struggle comes to an end. Slower ball outside off, no cut on the ball, and it takes the leading edge which ends up in Chandimal's lap at cover. Soft dismissal but Malinga showing off his death-bowling skills
another full slower delivery outside off, good stride forward and steered to point
speared into the blockhole, terrific execution. Brathwaite plays that fine towards fine leg with an angled bat, not a great shot when he has just walked in but he connects
dropped. Should have been taken. Full outside off, Samuels skews the ball in the air to the man at deep cover who runs in and spills the chance as he got there low . Jayasuriya on the boundary.
full again and swatted to deep cover off the front foot all along the ground
quicker slider on off, squeezed to point
the legspinner now out of the front of the hand outside off, Samuels goes back and misses
his on the pad and there is a huge appeal from the keeper. Not given. Skids onto Samuels as he tries to flick
flat and quick yet again, Samuels keeps it out with a solid block
fullish but a tad wide outside off, another attempted cut missed
good over, just one of it. Fuller, no spin outside off, Samuels drives towards deep cover
what timing. That's why you do not drop Samuels. Full on off, Samuels has already cleared one foot and he just muscles this with all power over long-off. Stunning timing
good comeback, slower delivery outside off. Samuels tries to cut but misses
full, spearing in on middle. Samuels tickled this with soft hands towards backward square and scampers back for the second to get to his fifty. The captain has turned up at the right time.

may have been out with a direct hit, slower ball outside off which is directed to short third man. They go through for the single and it seems Brathwaite would have made it easy even with a direct hit
slower delivery outside off, chopped to the keeper
outside edge goes for four. Brathwaite totally deceived. The ball keeps going away from CB who flirts at that with no feet movement. Gets into a nasty mess but the outside edge runs away for four
wide, drifter down leg and a wide is called
full on off, Samuels calmly pushes this to long-off
fullish length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
skids one through outside off, dabbed to third man and Mathews fires an inaccurate throw for an overthrow
fuller on leg, clipped to midwicket
short and wide, cut out to the point fielder
gets down early and gets some bat on his sweep towards short fine leg where Malinga puts in a good diving stop
low full toss on off, Brathwaite premeditates the steer to third man and his the full toss straight to short third man
wild heave, but the inside edge goes to fine leg. Too full on leg and Samuels was unable to get under that
slower ball and dispatched by Brathwaite. Slides onto Brathwaite who smashes this over the long-on boundary for six. Picked that one right out of the hand
short of a length on middle, jabbed away towards midwicket with a flat-bat
poor delivery. With short third man up, Lakmal delivers this right in his hitting arc. Short and wide, Samuels just clobbers a cut wide over point. Clears the boundary comfortably too
clattered towards deep cover. Low full toss outside off and the drive is all timing towards that deep fielder. Terrific to watch
slides onto Samuels who defends off the front foot
short and wide, Samuels cuts but straight to point
full on leg, worked with soft hands towards deep midwicket, Samuels wants two but won't get it
carrom ball now on off, but the length is good, Not too full and Brathwaite can only push towards long-on

half-volley on leg, Samuels works this towards deep midwicket and looking for the second immediately. Brathwaite is already committed to the second and comes through. By the time, Samuels decides, the throw is already in the bowler's hand who gives the ball to the keeper and Samuels has to walk back. Two batsmen stuck at one end and Brathwaite wanted to sacrifice himself but he was well past the crease
fullish on leg, Taylor works this towards long-on

nice slower ball and another run out. Good work from Malinga. Full on middle and Taylor pushes this wide off the bowler who runs around, picks up and fires a direct hit at the non-strikers end. Quick work from LM.
slower ball outside off, bunted towards midwicket but there is only one. Narine wanted another but would have been another run out had he gone

one more run out. Some more terrific work from Malinga. What a sight to see, a sprawling Malinga trying to save a run. Slower delivery on middle, Narine plays it by his feet and calls for the single. Brathwaite responds but Malinga is too quick. Swoops on the ball and under-arms a direct hit at the strikers end.

another slower ball on middle and another run-out. What have WI done? They have imploded  and are now run out.  A succession of run outs and WI don't even play out the overs. Bizarre, bizarre batting. Rampaul worked this to square leg and Narine is looking for the second, but Rampaul sends him back a bit too late. The throw is on the bounce and Narine is a few feet short of his ground

inn2.comm: good length, swinging in to Kusal who inside-edges onto his body. Pacey start
good length, slightly wider outside off stump. Kusal gets behind the line to defend
good length and swung away through backward square. Great shot. Picked the length early and deposited it over the infield. Pitches and rolls to the boundary
fullish and wide outside off, Kusal throws his hands at that and gets a thick outside edge which flies to third man
full again, swinging away from off stump. Dilshan drives to mid-off with a confident stride
short on middle and leg, helped on its way to the man at backward square with a pull
crashed! Short on off and Dilshan creams a pull wide off square leg. Raced to the boundary, not a good length
good length wider outside off, Dilshan looks to punch through covers with not much feet movement but the ball goes towards mid-on off the inside half of the bat
a bit too much width now, short and wide and Dilshan just creams a cut through point for another boundary

leading edge flies over Rampaul's head. Should have been taken. Lands inside the boundary too. Wow, that flew. Good length swinging away, Dilshan wants to hit that to the leg side but checks his shot as he makes contact. The ball flies over Rampaul who totally misjudged that
strays down leg now, and the keeper fumbles so there are some more extras.
good delivery met by an equally good defensive stroke. Fullish on off, Kusal gets a good stride forward to defend
misfield, some more sloppy fielding. Fullish on middle which is heaved with terrible timing towards mid-on, Brathwaite dives to his left and lets the ball through, should have stopped that
Dilshan tries his famous dilscoop but misses, the ball just evades leg stump.
good length swinging away, Dilshan offers the full face of the bat as he opens the face to get the ball wide of cover for one
slower ball on off, good run. Perera pushes that towards mid-on with discernibly soft hands and sets off for a quick run. Gets it comfortably
overpitched on middle, hustled for pace maybe but Dilshan squirts the ball in front of square for a couple
slower ball on off, bunted to cover
good length on leg, this one skids onto hit Dilshan on the thighs before rolling towards the off side
good length on off, Kusal stays back in his crease and punches to cover
shortish again, Kusal rocks back to swivel-pull with one foot off the ground but he is struck on the body, they scamper one off the deflection
movement. Nice length that, full and swinging away, and when he pitches it up, there is some swing on offer. Dilshan squeezes this to third man with no feet movement.
too much swing from around the wicket. The ball swings in to Kusal and goes too far, the full toss flicks Kusal's pads on its way to the fine leg boundary
full on off and Kusal muscles this over long-off boundary. All power and timing, picked the length early and the ball flies over the boundary
slower ball, good adjustment from Kusal who steers this to point off the front foot

what was that? That may have swung. An inswinger takes out off stump. What a start that is. Wobbled in the air and pitched outside off and swung in to take out Dilshan's off bail. Dilshan is flabbergasted and rightly so. He had no clue of that. Add that to his repertoire.
ah, the runs continue. Short and wide and LT plays the late cut and with a lot of power, flies towards the third man boundary
slower offspinner on off, blocked
offspinner drifting down leg, clipped wristily towards square leg
slow offspinner on middle, played into the leg side watchfully
regulation offspinner yet again on off which is nurdled confidently towards square leg
fullish on middle, pushed towards long-on
slowish outside off, defended off the front foot
slower through the air outside off, not much turn. Cut to point
tossed up on middle which is turned away towards midwicket for a single
slower through the air on middle, Kusal stays back and pushes that towards deep midwicket with soft hands. Easily come back for two. Great placement
flatter outside off, skids on with the arm and Kusal chops that back along the ground towards cover
spins on leg and turns to off, LT stays back and keeps it out
good batting, goes back and punches the offspinner towards long-off with the spin
another offspinner, no swing for Narine, what a shame! Defended
Kusal gets down early and looks to sweep but is struck on the body
a bit shortish outside off, pushed to cover
that once came back in, may have been the carrom delivery. Kusal rocks back and defends
slower through the air buts kids on to off, pushed off the back foot to cover
excellent shot! All quality. Comes down to meet the ball as it pitches, gets there and lofts that easily over the long-off boundary. Great shot selection and played that with the spin
fullish, played into the off side
slightly too full outside off, driven to long-off
flight on middle, patted to midwicket
strays down leg and Kusal misses the flick, a wide should have been called but the umpire thinks there was a deflection.
fullish outside off, driven to cover
tossed up on off, too much flight, ends up being overpitched, drilled to long-off
shortish outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
short again on off, LT wants to punch but the ball doesn't get to him, hit back to the bowler
tossed up on off, driven to cover with the spin
a tad too short, this time LT makes enough room to cut to  the sweeper cover
short and wide, easily cut to the deep point fielder
overpitched outside off, drilled to long-off
too short and wide again from Samuels, cut to point
too full now on off, easily worked with the spin to long-off fielder. Taylor fumbles at long-off and gives the second. Poor fielding
shortish and wide outside off, slapped to deep cover
too full again outside off, skewed towards long-on for yet another easy single
tossed up nicely on off, leading edge rolls to short mid-off
flatter on off, Kusal wants to come down and work into the leg side but is struck on the pads
drops this one short outside off, punch-driven to the sweeper cover
full on middle, tickled with soft hands towards midwicket
flighted on off and middle, Kusal dances down the track and heaves to long-on along the ground
nice batting. Pushes the flighted delivery to long-off with the spin, offers a full face of the bat
round-arm action, offspinner outside off, punched to cover with a high elbow
slightly quick and flat on leg, easily nudged to the vacant midwicket region
round-arm again outside off, cut to point
this one drifts on with the arm outside off, Kusal stays back and cuts to point yet again
nice variation. Round-arm but slow on off, turning away, Kusal drives towards extra cover and sets off for a quick single
nice looking drive, just leans on the drive to find the gap through covers for two. A riskless four off the over
nicely bowled, fuller on off, blocked
tossed up on middle, slower through the air, played into the leg side
gets down early and executes the sweep nicely. A bit too full on off, Kusal shuffles across and clobbers the sweep wide of square leg for four. No one patrolling the boundary there
fullish and wide, Kusal chooses to cut, hits to point
short and wide yet again, Kusal finds the gap in front of point for a couple more.
fired in on off, quelled back to the bowler off the back foot
short and wide, persisting with that line and length. Cut to point
tossed up on off, LT goes back and works the ball towards midwicket for one
worked off towards midwicket
short and wide yet again, creamed off the back foot with a cut to the sweeper cover
tossed up on off, driven back to the bowler
shortish outside off, punch-driven off the back foot to the sweeper
short and wide to start, LT cuts confidently to third man
fullish on off from wider of the crease, driven towards cover who half-stops
short and wide again, cut easily towards the man at third man
slower yorker from quite a height, dug out by Kusal
swivelled away off the front foot towards deep fine leg, a bit too full from CB
slower delivery just outside off, Kusal makes room and cuts wide of point towards the sweeper cover for one
tossed up but Kusal advances to meet the ball as it pitches on off and drive to long-off
nicely played, slightly fuller but not overpitched. LT bends his knees and finds a gap through cover
low full toss on middle, whipped away to deep midwicket
short and wide yet again, cut to the sweeper cover off the back foot
dropped short outside off, cut off the back foot for another single to deep point
full on middle, steered to point off the front foot
round the wicket, a length ball is jabbed towards cover off the front foot, a quick single, there's a direct hit but no worries for the batsmen
again pushed out off the front foot in front of point for a single
fired in towards the pads, clipped to square leg for one more, keeping it simple against Narine
bit more air this time, a tough shorter, blocked back towards the bowler
width on offer, slapped towards cover, a diving stop and there's no run to be had
pitched up and that is pushed to mid-off, that's four overs of Narine done with, four to go
short of length ball from over the wicket, angling towards the batsman, who dabs it towards point for a single to bring up the 100
just outside off, pitched up, and that is whipped away towards deep square leg for two
way down the leg side, a free run
length ball outside off, flat-batted firmly towards mid-off
gets to 50 with a big six, the shot wasn't the prettiest but the ball ends up well over the midwicket rope, a slower ball outside off, Kusal has time to get on his knee and power-swipe that for six
great comeback from Brathwaite, the perfect yorker, Kusal squeezes it out
high full toss this time, takes Kusal by surprise, he manages to defend that, above waist high says the square-leg umpire, free-hit coming up
takes full toll of the free hit, slower one outside off, clobbered over long-off for six, 17 off the over as Sri Lanka take charge of the game
bowled from wide of the crease by Narine, from round the wicket, defended to the off side
more forward defence this time, Sri Lanka watchful against Narine
just a bit of width, Thirimanne backs away and guides that to short third man, another dot ball
full and on the pads, turned towards square leg for a single
solid forward defence once more, the ball rolls away in front of point, time enough for a quick single

direct hit was needed! there isn't one, and Thirimanne survives, he pushed this one towards point and sprinted off for a tight single, he was scrambling to make his ground and was relieved to see the ball miss the stumps. Gone with a direct hit and by some distance too
good length straying down leg to begin, easily clipped off his hips towards short fine leg
drifts down leg and some more free runs, Kusal just gets some bat on that to the fine leg boundary. Not wise bowling with fine leg in the circle

parried for six. Not only dropped but Blackwood pushes that for six! WI needed that desperately. Good length on middle, Kusal swivel-pulls it high in the air towards the deep midwicket boundary where Blackwood comes in and misjudges that, he was well inside the boundary but thought he was on the edge. Six more
full on middle, pushed to long-on
shortish and wide, LT leans on the cut, delectable stroke. Finds the gap too and that will be another four to SL. WI losing their lengths and their fielding hasn't impressed either
slower delivery on middle, a bit too full and pushed back to the bowler
slower on off, Kusal rocks back and slaps a ball to cover off the back foot
a bit slower on off, pushed to midwicket
short and wide, but grips in the wicket a  touch and Kusal has to improvise and hit that to long-off
slower but short outside off, chopped to point
overpitched on leg, driven with the full face of the bat to long-on
good length, skids on towards middle but an inside-edge rolls towards square leg for one
short on middle, whipped away elegantly to deep midwicket
overpitched outside off, easily driven to  deep cover
short and wide, put away. Poor bowling this. Kusal gets back and finds the gap with a nicely timed cut in front of point. Even with a slow outfield, it races away
picks the gap again nicely, fuller outside off, driven to deep cover with a lot of power
terrible bowling from Samuels, short and wide yet again with no one on the deep point boundary. Thiri cuts nicely in front of the extra cover fielder, races across for four more. Terrific stuff
full but a bit wide outside off, Kusal gets a thick outside edge down to third man
ramped off the face of the bat to third man. Waits for the short ball to come to him, bends his back, sways out of the line and late cuts uppishly.
shortish and wide again, Kusal cuts but straight to point
what timing, even better placement. Just times that to the boundary, a bit short and wide. Kusal opens the face of the bat and guides that to the third man boundary. Great execution
short but not that wide, Kusal persists with that cut, the ball goes to point though
sliced to point. Terrific timing yet again but finds Darren Bravo at backward point on the bounce. Full and squeezed, fancies that area does Kusal
round-arm action, lands it perfectly though. Full on off, turning away which is met by the broad face of Thiri's bat
slower on leg, easily worked towards square leg for one
beats point! Slower but a bit wide outside off, Kusal plays the cut late to short third man. the fielder dives but the ball beats him. The point fielder runs and drags it in
slow on off, defended
fuller on off, just a hint of turn. Squirted to point
slower and fuller outside off, left alone
and he gets his fifty with a terrific shot. What placement. Full and wide outside off, angled across him who square-drives in the gap behind two points. Splendid knock
and again. Picks the same gap once more. Wow! Shortish and wide, Thirimanne stays back, arches his back and cuts beautifully in that gap for four. Making it look all too easy
full and wide now. Thirimanne looks for that drive but misses, he is beaten outside off
overpitched outside off, just pushed to long-off for an easy single
fuller than a good length on middle, Kusal pushes the ball with soft hands towards deep midwicket. Picks up two more
slower ball on leg, Kusal misses and is struck on the pads, there is a huge appeal but the ball pitched well outside leg. Easy call.
short on off, should have been put away but Thiri's punch finds cover
slower on leg, clipped to midwicket
slower once again on off, Thiri hangs back and cracks a drive to long-off off the back foot
overpitched outside off, pushed to long-off
slower through the air outside off, opens the face of the bat to find the gap through cover
slower through the air again, on off and defended towards cover. They run through for one
slower ball on leg, tickled to short fine leg
slower ball again, shortish and on a sixth-stump line, pulled to deep midwicket
fuller length on middle, worked away towards wide long-on
full just outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
slower delivery on off, punched off the back foot to the sweeper cover. Nicely opened the face of the bat there
good length outside off, Kusal wants to cut towards point but chops to the keeper instead
comes back in and takes Thiri on the glove as he tried to cut, misjudged the line. Brathwaite appealed but the ball hit only glove
jabbed away wide of cover. A bit too short again and Kusal forces it through uppishly. Kusal is struggling to run
freebie. Misses out on four of those six required for him. Full on leg with fine leg up but he picks that man perfectly
shortish and slightly wide, Kusal opens the face to guide to third man
good length on leg, pushed to midwicket with the angle
short again and slightly wide, guided to third man
good length on off, slapped to deep cover with a punch off the back foot
another missed opportunity, slower ball on leg, hits his pads and then rolls towards square leg for one
full outside off, inside-halved to midwicket
slower ball on off, pushed off the front foot to long-off
what a run! He sprints across with that cramp and makes his ground. That was brisk. Pushes the fullish delivery towards mid-off and dashes for the other end. makes it despite a direct hit
fuller length, angled across the left-hander who pushes this down to long-off with the angle
short outside off to start from Carter, chopped down to third man
he goes for it but doesn't quite get it, short-arm jabbed away wide of long-on. The fielder gets across and returns a good throw to the keeper but Kusal makes it back
yorker on off, dug out towards point for one more
angled in to Thiri's pads who nudges to midwicket
slower ball on middle, guided towards point for one
dug in on leg but a bit too high and a bit leg side-ish, Kusal gets under that and is called wide
short on leg, Kusal whips across and clobbers a pull straight to short fine leg.
slower delivery on leg, pushed to long-on

he has gone! What a shame. Short ball outside off, Kusal goes back and tries to pull to the leg side but the ball is angled across and he goes through with the shot. The ball slices up straight up in the air and carries to short fine leg who takes a good running, overhead catch. Kusal is distraught after that shot but he has to go for 99
good length outside off, steered to point off the back foot
good length outside off, guided to point off the front foot
lobbed for an agonizing amount of time towards square leg, back of a length delivery, rearing back in to take the handle of the bat or the forearm as Chandi was looking to fend. Leg bye given
shortish on middle, Thiri rolls his wrists on that and keeps it down to deep square leg for one
full on off, not much spin, driven to cover
darted in quicker on middle, skids onto the batsman as he nudges towards square leg
quick through the air on off, hardly any turn, solidly blocked
nice, slower through the air on middle and off, a bit of turn but Chandi works with the spin to midwicket
flatter on leg, clipped wristily to deep fine leg for two
nice end. Flat outside off, Chandi gets behind the line to defend
slower delivery on middle, Thiri looks to go down the ground but the ball skews off the inside half over midwicket. They get back for two
very wide and full, LT reaches for that and guides to deep point
short ball outside off, doesn't get up high enough. Dabbed to third man
short on leg, LT rolls his wrists on that and keeps his pull down to short fine leg
good bouncer on middle, Thiri is hustled for pace but gets the pull towards backward square leg
full on off, played out off the front foot towards point
carrom ball, Chandi doesn't pick it and is struck on the pads but outside the line of off stump. Hardly any appeal
tossed up on off, driven back to the bowler
the other one yet again, Chandi plays defensively but gets a thick inside edge which runs across towards square leg. They come back for the second
driven to long-on off the front foot
full on off, calmly pushed to mid-on
another solid forward defensive. Full delivery outside off which is patted back
full ball, angling in to the right-hander who finds midwicket with his push
fullish length on leg, nudged to midwicket again
ugly hoick but that will be four. Skips down the track and wants to hit down the ground but the ball skews off the inside half towards backward square leg for four
fullish length on middle, defensively pushed towards mid-on
good fielding on the boundary. Shortish length on leg, Chandi comes down and swivel-pulls this to the fine leg boundary but Blackwood runs around and keeps that in
good length outside off, the outside half of the bat has been opened to guide to third man
short bouncer and wide called, too high. Six needed now
half-volley on middle, nicely driven to long-on
extremely full on off, Thiri opens the face to get the ball to the sweeper cover
another short bouncer. Outside off but too high, called wide again
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on off, driven to mid-off for a quick single
full on off from around the wicket, steered to point
angled in towards Thiri's pads who flicks towards mid-on for one
solid defense, full on leg
good length on leg, clipped to midwicket
pushed to mid-on for a quick single, and SL have completed a comfortable eight-wicket win and also a series win. Thirimanne plays a terrific hand in his chase and is jubilant in triumph
